body:
Yo ppl.Ive been thinking that for the next tourney we should have a Top list of people with most kills and monuments

Ok so during or within a tournament the people who break a monument within the tournament games go on a top monument scorer list as above and the more monuments you break the higher you get on the list.

And at the same time there is a top kills list within the tournament and the people who get a kill go on the top kills list and the more kills you get the higher you go on the list.

Also,at the end of the tournament the officals vote on the MVP of the tournament.

The prize if you get any of the awards is 5k credits each and a tag on forums that says "Golden Pickaxe Winner"
or "Golden Sword Winner" or "MVP of [insert tournament name here]

For monuments it would go like this:
Ign l Monuments l Games played
farty          12.                  6
Poop13.    12.                  7
Pee567.      9.                  6

For kills:

Ign l Kills l Games played
Guy    67.            3
Man.    67.          4
Child.   56         3

And whoever gets top gets golden sword or golden pickaxe


thx for reading

title: Tournament idea

replies.body: This doesn't make much sensemble but If I get what you are saying, this wouldn't be that good of a tournament..
replies.body_tagged: This doesn't make much sensemble but If I get what you are saying, this wouldn't be that good of a tournament..

replies.body: So several MVP's are voted by the officials and they get a separate rank/reward?
replies.body_tagged: So several MVP's are voted by the officials and they get a separate rank/reward?

replies.body: Considering the tournaments are all team based, individual stats won't show much at all. Would be cool though
replies.body_tagged: Considering the tournaments are all team based, individual stats won't show much at all. Would be cool though

replies.body: Idk about this.. Like frozen said, it's a team based game so... The best are the self proclaimed MVPs.
replies.body_tagged: Idk about this.. Like frozen said, it's a team based game so... The best are the self proclaimed MVPs.

replies.body: I think this would be good and encourage more players participating in the tournament to try even harder just in case their team does lose so maybe they can still get something out of the tournament by playing their absolute best and getting aknowledged for it by getting MVP or something
